scripts.package: aws cloudformation package --template-file template.yaml --output-template-file build/output.yaml --s3-bucket csv-processing-sqs-machine
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file build/output.yaml --stack-name fromS3toDynamoDb --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
scripts.qd: npm run folder && npm run bucket && npm run package && npm run deploy
